schema.title: SeismicAcquisitionDocuments
schema.description: Files produced during the course of Seismic Acquisition, including observer logs, source and receiver information tables, and unprocessed navigation.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

PrincipalAcquisitionProjectID.title: Principal Acquisition Project ID
PrincipalAcquisitionProjectID.description: For most datasets, the acquisition project that generated the underlying field data.  For merges, probably absent (see processing project for set of acquisition projects used in processing this dataset).

SeismicFieldTraceDataID.title: Seismic Field Trace Data ID
SeismicFieldTraceDataID.description: Seismic dataset(s) containing unprocessed data, as acquired.

HeaderDescriptionIDs.title: Header Description IDs
HeaderDescriptionIDs.description: Description of the SEG-D headers.   May include a recorded example. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

ObserverLogIDs.title: ObserverLogIDs
ObserverLogIDs.description: Documents produced during acquisition, containing reports on acquisition activities and progress. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

LineLogIDs.title: Line Log IDs
LineLogIDs.description: Documents produced at end of each line, including information on shotpoint ranges, tapes, and files. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

ReceiverLogIDs.title: Receiver Log IDs
ReceiverLogIDs.description: Documents produced during acquisition, including parameters , along with recording QC for each shot. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

ReceiverInformationTableIDs.title: Receiver Information Table IDs
ReceiverInformationTableIDs.description: Document collected during acquisition which includes a format description and attribute properties.  Typically rows are collected for each line and shotpoint, with information on receivers. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

ReceiverSignatureIDs.title: Receiver Signature IDs
ReceiverSignatureIDs.description: Receiver response collected during acquisition.  May include response to differing receiver group orientations. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

SeismicNavigationIDs.title: Seismic Navigation IDs
SeismicNavigationIDs.description: Unprocessed navigation collected during seismic acquisition in formats including P1/11 or P1/90. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

SourceSignatureIDs.title: Source Signature IDs
SourceSignatureIDs.description: Seismic source recording acquired near the source. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

SourceInformationTableIDs.title: Source Information Table IDs
SourceInformationTableIDs.description: Document collected during acquisition which includes a format description and attribute properties.  Typically rows are collected for each line and shotpoint, with information on sources, like volume, depth, and timing errors. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

RecorderResponseIDs.title: Recorder Response IDs
RecorderResponseIDs.description: Recording system  parameters and signature. The array consists of record IDs, which identify a OSDU file or dataset resource.

SeismicAcquisitionReport.title: Seismic Acquisition Report
SeismicAcquisitionReport.description: Reference to a dataset containing the seismic acquisition report.
